summary: The module provides build and packaging utilities for the Conan C/C++ package manager. It includes a script that leverages PyInstaller to create a single, platform‑specific executable containing the Conan command‑line tool and its runtime dependencies, as well as two setuptools configuration scripts that define metadata, version handling, and dependency lists for generating source and binary distributions of the Conan client and server packages.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable distribution and deployment of Conan by automating the creation of self‑contained executables and standard Python packages, thereby simplifying installation for end users and integration into continuous‑integration and deployment workflows.
